name: Litil Divil
description: Litil Divil is a video game released by Gremlin Interactive in 1993. The player takes control of a little red devil called Mutt who is trying to escape from a dungeon. The dungeon consists of a maze maneveured through from an over shoulder perspective and rooms where Mutt is facing various riddles. The character was created by a student from Cann Hall Primary School, as part of a nationwide competition. The schoolboy William Cummings received the 1st copy of the finished product as a reward for winning the competition.
